name: Valley of the Kings
description:
Valley of the Kings is a 2D action platformer where you die in one hit. Whip, swing, and jump your way through a challenging, interconnected world that wears its NES inspiration on its sleeve, blending an 8-bit art style with modern aesthetics like particle effects and lighting.

We're looking to gather feedback on what we've built so far as well as gauge interest in a full release. Any and all comments are welcome!

Controller and keyboard (WASD + Space + Arrow Keys) are supported. Controls can be found in the options menu.
